adrFormatAddress: 718 10th Ave, New York, NY 10019-7129, USA

originalText.text: Initially, I chose this place because it was close to my apartment. But it turned out to be a wonderful place to have my teeth cleaned and serviced. Dr. Behnaz Garemani are always such a great job on my teeth and has a wonderful bedside manner. Plus, I love the music that play while I'm in the chair.

text.text: Initially, I chose this place because it was close to my apartment. But it turned out to be a wonderful place to have my teeth cleaned and serviced. Dr. Behnaz Garemani are always such a great job on my teeth and has a wonderful bedside manner. Plus, I love the music that play while I'm in the chair.

originalText.text:
Dr. Garemany and her team are absolutely phenomenal!

I recently had full veneers done, and the results are beyond amazing. Throughout the entire process, Dr. Garemany ensured that I was comfortable and pain-free.

Her numbing technique is truly remarkable! Plus, her attention to detail and expertise in cosmetic dentistry are unmatched. If you're considering veneers or any dental work, Dr. Garemany is the one to see. You won't be disappointed!

originalText.text: Grateful to Dr Garemani & the whole staff for taking wonderful care of me! A great dentist is hard to find- & a great dental OFFICE is almost harder. Brite Dental Spa gives world class service with a neighborhood vibe. So happy I found them!üíó

originalText.text: STAY AWAY from this office!! They charged my credit card after I called to cancel an appointment A WEEK IN ADVANCED. Now they refuse to refund me the money alleging I ‚Äúnever cancelled‚Äù the appointment. I will not be back and definitely I do not recommend them.

originalText.text: I initially came to this place because I wanted a second opinion on some cavities diagnosis. I was convinced that my previous dentist was trying to scam me -- 5 cavities and you're not going to show me the scans, uh ma'am do you take me for a fool?? So I canceled my appointment and came here. At this point I was feeling a little weary of dentists in general so I was acting coy in the initial appointment, I told them I was there because "my last dentist gave me the ouchies" (its true they did violate my gums and they didn't even hold my hands). Almost immediately I could tell they saw through my charade but they kindly went along with it. Even though my insurance did not cover a second dental scan, Dr Garemani swung me a favor and did it free of charge. And while we're on the topic of Dr Garemani, I have to say hands down she's been the best dentists I've had in my life. She's not only extremely competent when it comes to the dental procedure (no pain in the procedure at all) but she's also a really fun person to talk to which goes a long way in helping you relax in the chair. For once I'm actually looking forward to going to the Dentist. Might even start going more than 2x a year, holy heck, that's how life altering the experience was. Oh and for those of you wondering, it turns out I DID have 5 cavities (what can I say ya boi got a lil sweet tooth), but hey it was worth it for me to find the best dentist in the city.
